Class bartMachine_c_debug

java.lang.Object
bartMachine.Classifier
bartMachine.bartMachine_a_base
bartMachine.bartMachine_b_hyperparams
bartMachine.bartMachine_c_debug
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
bartMachine_d_init
public abstract class bartMachine_c_debug extends bartMachine_b_hyperparams implements Serializable
This portion of the code used to have many debug functions. These have been removed during the tidy up for release.
See Also:

    • getDepthsForTrees

      public int[][] getDepthsForTrees(int n_g_i, int n_g_f)
      Queries the depths of the num_trees trees between a range of Gibbs samples
      Parameters:
      n_g_i - The Gibbs sample number to start querying
      n_g_f - The Gibbs sample number (+1) to stop querying
      Returns:
      The depths of all num_trees trees for each Gibbs sample specified

    • getNumNodesAndLeavesForTrees

      public int[][] getNumNodesAndLeavesForTrees(int n_g_i, int n_g_f)
      Queries the number of nodes (terminal and non-terminal) in the num_trees trees between a range of Gibbs samples
      Parameters:
      n_g_i - The Gibbs sample number to start querying
      n_g_f - The Gibbs sample number (+1) to stop querying
      Returns:
      The number of nodes of all num_trees trees for each Gibbs sample specified
